Reference

All functions

load_amazon_employment()

Gets formal employment data for the Brazilian Legal Amazon

load_amazon_gdp()

Gets GDP at current prices and (estimated) population data for the Brazilian Legal Amazon

load_amazon_income()

Gets income data for the Brazilian Legal Amazon

load_comex()

Loads foreign trade data from the Brazilian government from 1986 to the present

load_degrad()

Loads and cleans degradation data from INPE.

load_degrad_raw()

Loads DEGRAD data from INPE.

load_deter()

Loads and cleans INPE data on areas with deforestation warnings

load_deter_raw()

Loads INPE data on areas with deforestation warnings

load_employment()

Gets formal employment data for Brazil.

load_gdp()

Gets GDP at current prices and (estimated) population data for Brazil

load_ibama()

Compiles environmental fines data in the Amazon Region from IBAMA

load_income()

Gets income data for Brazil

load_IPS()

Compiles information on the indicators part of the Social Progress Index (SPI) for the Amazon region

load_mapbiomas_covering()

load_mapbiomas_covering

load_mapbiomas_transition()

load_mapbiomas_transition

load_pam_main()

PAM Main products Loads agricultural data of four main tillages - corn, potato, peanut and beans - from Brazil from 2003 to the present

load_pam_permanent()

PAM Permanent Tillage Loads agricultural data of permanent tillages from Brazil from 1974 to the present

load_pam_temporary()

PAM Temporary tillage Loads agricultural data of temporary tillages from Brazil from 1974 to the present

load_pevs_areasilv()

PEVS Silviculture area Loads total existing silviculture area of each product, as of December 31th, from 2013 to 2019

load_pevs_silvprod()

PEVS Forestry production Loads quantity produced and yield value of forestry extraction, by type of product, from 1986 to 2019

load_pevs_vegextr()

PEVS Plant extraction Loads quantity produced and yield value of plant extraction, by type of product, from 1986 to 2019

load_ppm()

load_ppm_ibge

load_prodes()

Loads and cleans deforestation data from INPE.

load_prodes_raw()

Loads deforestation data from INPE.

load_seeg()

Greenhouse gases emission estimates (SEEG) Loads data of estimates of emission of greenhouse gases of Brazilian cities

load_sigmine()

load_sigmine
